short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add equiptment type for each flight to the Alaska Airlines shopping page. Not affiliated with or endorsed by Alaska Airlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever shopped for Alaska Airlines flights on their website and been disappointed with how difficult it is to find the type of plane is being used for each flight?

With this extension, the plane type for each flight is added right below the flight details on the Alaska Airlines shopping website, along with current seat inventory per seat class!

Not affiliated or endorsed by Alaska Airlines.
